name: Lucky Draw
description: Draw 2 cards. You may play an additional Action Card.

name: Triple Strike
description: Deal 1 damage to target player and each opponent adjacent to the target player.

name: Shotgun blast
description: Roll a Six-sided die. If you roll a 4, 5, or 6, deal 3 damage to target player.

name: Power Surge
description: Shuffle your hand back into the deck and draw the same number of cards plus one additional card. You may play an additional Action Card.

name: Empty Revolver
description: Roll a 6 sided die. Deal X damage to target opponent.

name: Disarm
description: Deal 1 damage to target opponent. That player discards a card.

name: Rally
description: Look at target player's hand. You may play an Action Card from their hand this turn.

name: Sights locked
description: Effects of your Action Cards cannot be countered or dodged.

name: Defuse
description: Cancel the effect of target Action Card.

name: Headshot
description: After hitting an opponent, reveal this card from your hand to deal an additional point of damage and draw a card.

name: Revolver
description: Deal 2 damage to the targeted opponent.

name: Throwing Knife
description: Deal 1 damage to the targeted opponent.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: Draw a card and play an additional reaction card.

name: Trip Mine
description: Discard from your hand, target player who dealt damage to you discards a card.

name: Vengeful Strike
description: Discard from your hand, deal 1 damage to target player who dealt damage to you this turn.
